abstract: The self-replicating properties of the Julia sets Jc(p) for the iterative processes z implies zp+c are examined for integers p)1. It is shown that the corresponding Mandelbrot sets M(p) contain (p-1)-fold symmetries, which results in Jc(p) having p-fold symmetries.
meta: August 1987Journal of Physics A Mathematical and General 20(11):3533-3535
